sen.e: Imamairi no tsubone, birth unknown, death February 22, 1459, a woman of the Muromachi Period, was a nanny to 8 Dai Shogun (8th Brigadier General) Yoshimasa ASHIKAGA and a concubine.

sen.j: 義政のそばに蔓延る奸臣の一人として烏丸資任、有馬持家とともに三魔（おいま、からすま、ありま）と呼ばれた。
sen.e: As a cunning servant who ran wild at Yoshimasa's side, she was known to both Suketo KARASUMA and Mochiie ARIMA as the "Three Demons" (Oima, Karasuma, Arima).

sen.j: 1449年（宝徳元年）に8代将軍となった義政は、1451年（宝徳3年）には尾張国の守護代人事に介入し、守護斯波義健に対して織田敏広を更迭して織田郷広を守護代にさせようとする。
sen.e: After becoming 8th Brigadier General in 1449, Yoshimasa then in 1451 intervened in the personnel administration of the Shugodai (leader of Shugo in Owari Province) against Deputy Yoshitake SHIBA, aiding in the dismissal of Toshihiro ODA and attempting to install Satohiro ODA as Deputy.

After becoming the eighth shogun in 1449, in 1451 Yoshimasa intervened in the personnel administration of the Shugodai (deputy of Shugo, provincial constable) of Owari Province, Yoshitake SHIBA, aiding in the dismissal of Toshihiro ODA and attempting to install Satohiro ODA as Shugodai.
